resources.string:
-Set the difficulty first when playing against the computer, otherwise the computer will have the default IQ.
-To start the game select any card or press the start button to select different game options.
-Once the game is started, each player selects two cards at a time. If the cards match, that player goes again. If not it's the other player's turn.
-Each successful match scores 4 points. Each unsuccessful match subtracts one point.

string-array.name: MATCH_TITLE_ARRAY
string-array.item: This Is The Title For Match #1
This Is The Title For Match #2
This Is The Title For Match #3

string-array.name: MATCH_DESCRIPTION_ARRAY
string-array.item: This Is The Description for Match Item #1. This can be a very long description with lots of informative text. Maybe it will be 3 or 4 sentences long.
This Is The Description for Match Item #2. This can be a very long description with lots of informative text. Maybe it will be 3 or 4 sentences long.
This Is The Description for Match Item #3. This can be a very long description with lots of informative text. Maybe it will be 3 or 4 sentences long.
